00024 void BaseObject::yaw(Radian radians)
00025 {
00026     Quaternion q(Radian(radians), Vector3::UNIT_Y);
00027     setOrientation(m_orientation * q);
00028 }
00029 
00030 void BaseObject::roll(Radian radians)
00031 {
00032     Quaternion q(Radian(radians), Vector3::UNIT_Z);
00033     setOrientation(m_orientation * q);
00034 }
00035 
00036 void BaseObject::pitch(Radian radians)
00037 {
00038     Quaternion q(Radian(radians), Vector3::UNIT_X);
00039     setOrientation(m_orientation * q);
00040 }

00052 Vector3 BaseObject::getHeading() const
00053 {
00054     return m_orientation * Vector3(0, 0, -1);
00055 }
00056 
00057 Vector3 BaseObject::getNormal() const
00058 {
00059     return m_orientation * Vector3(0, 1, 0);

00068     m_orientation = orientation;
00069     m_orientation.normalise();

00138 void PhysicsObject::updatePhysics(Real timeElapsed) 
00139 {
00140     // if(m_mass == 0) {
00141     // TODO: Throw exception
00142     // }
00143     
00144     m_acceleration = m_force / m_mass;
00145     m_velocity = m_velocity + (m_acceleration * timeElapsed);
00146     setPosition(getPosition() + (m_velocity * timeElapsed));
00147 }
